Package com.behreajj.camzup.friendly

Class MaterialPImage

java.lang.Object
com.behreajj.camzup.core.EntityData
com.behreajj.camzup.core.Material
com.behreajj.camzup.core.MaterialUv
com.behreajj.camzup.friendly.MaterialPImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOriented2, ISpatial2, IVolume, IVolume2
public class MaterialPImage extends MaterialUv
A material which supports PImages as textures.
